verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> working together <S%G4903><s%> with him we entreat <S%G3870><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that ye <S%G5209><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> vain <S%G2756><s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%>, At an acceptable <S%G1184><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> I hearkened <S%G1873><s%> unto thee <S%G4675><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a day <S%G2250><s%> of salvation <S%G4991><s%> did I succor <S%G997><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%>, now <S%G3568><s%> is the acceptable <S%G2144><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>; behold <S%G2400><s%>, now <S%G3568><s%> is the day <S%G2250><s%> of salvation <S%G4991><s%>):

giving <S%G1325><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> occasion of stumbling <S%G4349><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> anything <S%G3367><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> our ministration <S%G1248><s%> be <S%G3469><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> blamed <S%G3469><s%>;

but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> commending <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> ministers <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> afflictions <S%G2347><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> necessities <S%G318><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> distresses <S%G4730><s%>,

in <S%G1722><s%> stripes <S%G4127><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> imprisonments <S%G5438><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> tumults <S%G181><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> labors <S%G2873><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> watchings <S%G70><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> fastings <S%G3521><s%>;

in <S%G1722><s%> pureness <S%G54><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> long suffering <S%G3115><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> kindness <S%G5544><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> love <S%G26><s%> unfeigned <S%G505><s%>,

in <S%G1722><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of truth <S%G225><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>; by <S%G1223><s%> the armor <S%G3696><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> on the right hand <S%G1188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on the left <S%G710><s%>,

by <S%G1223><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dishonor <S%G819><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> evil report <S%G1426><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> good report <S%G2162><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> deceivers <S%G4108><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> yet true <S%G227><s%>;

as <S%G5613><s%> unknown <S%G50><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> yet well known <S%G1921><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> dying <S%G599><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, we live <S%G2198><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> chastened <S%G3811><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> killed <S%G2289><s%>;

as <S%G5613><s%> sorrowful <S%G3076><s%>, yet <S%G1161><s%> always <S%G104><s%> rejoicing <S%G5463><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%>, yet <S%G1161><s%> making <S%G4148><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> rich <S%G4148><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> yet possessing <S%G2722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.
Our <S%G2257><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> is open <S%G455><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, O Corinthians <S%G2881><s%>, our <S%G2257><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is enlarged <S%G4115><s%>.

Ye are <S%G4729><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> straitened <S%G4729><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> ye are straitened <S%G4729><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your own <S%G5216><s%> affections <S%G4698><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> for a recompense <S%G489><s%> in like kind <S%G846><s%> (I speak <S%G3004><s%> as unto <S%G5613><s%> my children <S%G5043><s%>), be <S%G4115><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> enlarged <S%G4115><s%>.

Be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> unequally yoked <S%G2086><s%> with unbelievers <S%G571><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> fellowship <S%G3352><s%> have righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>? or <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> communion <S%G2842><s%> hath light <S%G5457><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> concord <S%G4857><s%> hath Christ <S%G5547><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> Belial <S%G955><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> portion <S%G3310><s%> hath a believer <S%G4103><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an unbeliever <S%G571><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> agreement <S%G4783><s%> hath a temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> idols <S%G1497><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> a temple <S%G3485><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>; even as <S%G2531><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> said <S%G3754><s%>, I will dwell <S%G1774><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> walk in <S%G1704><s%> them <S%G2532><s%>; and I will be <S%G2071><s%> their <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> people <S%G2992><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Come ye out <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be ye separate <S%G873><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> no unclean <S%G169><s%> thing <S%G2532><s%>; And I <S%G2504><s%> will receive <S%G1523><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a Father <S%G3962><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> daughters <S%G2364><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Almighty <S%G3841><s%>.
